title: Shoemaker Ecco leaks almost 60GB of customer data
description: A misconfigured database has been leaking sensitive Ecco customer data since June 2021.

title: FBI gives ad blockers the seal of approval
description: To protect yourself from scams, the FBI is recommending one of the biggest thorns big tech's side.

title: Comcast Xfinity accounts are being attacked in 2FA bypass attacks
description: Hijacked Comcast Xfinity accounts are being used to breach more services, including cryptocurrency exchanges.

title: Anker admits Eufy camera security issues
description: However Anker also updates and tweaks its language and denies some of the alleged issues.

title: Sports betting giant BetMGM reveals data breach, customer data stolen
description: Over 1.5 million BetMGM customers affected by the incident, with names and addresses stolen and put up for sale.

title: Google is overhauling its employee performance systems
description: More low-performers, fewer high-achievers: is Google using this to back up any decisions for cutbacks and layoffs?

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (December 23)
description: From highly anticipated thriller sequels to returning fantasy series, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

title: Google just made another of its data privacy tools free for everyone
description: New open source tool is set to make it easier for videographers and data scientists to be mindful of the data privacy of others - without doing very much at all.

title: Your Garmin Instinct 2 is about to get some amazing new features for free
description: Garmin's Morning Report and wrist-based running power are coming soon to Instinct 2 users, but no word on the Crossover.

title: List of Xbox FPS Boost games on Xbox Series X and Xbox Series S
description: Thanks to FPS Boost, the Xbox Series X and Series S can boost framerates across several popular games. Here's every title that's supported.

title: LastPass confirms customer password vaults were stolen
description: LastPass vaults are encrypted, but crooks can try and guess the master password.

title: DuckDuckGo is now blocking one of Google's most annoying pop ups
description: DuckDuckGo wants to stop Sign in with Google from collecting data about your browsing history.

title: Marvel's Daredevil: Born Again won't be fully R-rated
description: Charlie Cox opens up on the prospect of a completely R-rated Daredevil MCU TV series.
